recipe.title: Chick-Peas and Olives Vinaigrette
ingredients: a 16- to 19-ounce can chick-peas, rinsed and drained
a 3-ounce jar pimiento-stuffed olives (about 1/2 cup), drained and sliced
instructions: In a bowl whisk together oil, vinegar, and mustard. Add chick-peas, olives, parsley, pepper, and salt to taste and toss to combine.
